Text:
Great job. Thank you. Grande trabalho. Obrigado.
 Work perfect. Trabalho perfeito.

If you have problem with Nero and want to remove after normal removing use a registry cleaner tool. ( CC cleaner don't work properly). I have used Auslogic Registry Cleaner who is free and work perfect. Simple I removed all Nero registry keys.
http://www.auslogics.com/en/software/registry-cleaner/download/
works fine so far, i just installed the software havent tested it much. However since this is a cracked version, you cannot update it online. the online access has been blocked.
